description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Find and develop sales leads.
              
              -	Follow and manage commercial projects pipeline.
              
              -	Build & develop relationship with existing & new customers.
              
              -	Present our company’s scope of service to the customer
              
              -	Coordinate with all departments to satisfy customers’ requirements, debt collection, etc.
              
              -	Work with both Vietnamese and foreign customers.
              
              -	Working place: Hanoi & HCM
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Good English/Vietnamese.
              
              -	Must have a minimum of 2+ year proven B2B sales experience.
              
              -	Proven professional selling skills.
              
              -	Strong result focused and customer oriented
              
              -	Willing to learn & act proactively to be part of a dynamic and fast growing company
              
              -	Having good relationships with commercial project developers such as hotels, resorts, apartments, fitness clubs, Spa, Hospital, etc. is a plus but not necessary.
              
              -	Open to Male & Female
              
              Apply your written CV (soft copy) with photo online by Vietnamworks
              

              Deadline to apply: 20/8/2018
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Having many opportunities to be trained abroad in USA, Korea and Singapore
               







                Basic benefits including social insurance, annual leaves & sick leaves
